about_the_game: Get ready for the ultimate kitchen showdown in this competitive online multiplayer cooking game, where up to 4 players can battle it out! The goal is simple: complete easy recipes before the timer runs out. But with constant chaos in the kitchen, it’s anything but easy. Sabotage your opponents by stunning or slowing them down while trying to keep your station under control. Timing and strategy are crucial as the kitchen becomes a battleground of culinary sabotage. When the cooking is done, a panel of three chefs will rate your dishes, but there’s more: sabotage your rivals effectively to boost your TV rating and earn extra points! Can you out-cook and out-sabotage your friends to become the ultimate Brawl Chef?

The goal is simple: complete easy recipes before the timer runs out. But with constant chaos in the kitchen, it’s anything but easy. Sabotage your opponents by stunning or slowing them down while trying to keep your station under control. Timing and strategy are crucial as the kitchen becomes a battleground of culinary sabotage. When the cooking is done, a panel of three chefs will rate your dishes, but there’s more: sabotage your rivals effectively to boost your TV rating and earn extra points! Can you out-cook and out-sabotage your friends to become the ultimate Brawl Chef?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 285
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Chef Brawl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 285
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: In this chaotic up to 4 players online cooking game, race to complete recipes while sabotaging your friends! Stun, slow, or distract opponents as you cook, earning bonus points from chefs and boosting your TV rating through creative mayhem. Can you handle the heat?
